law.text: In applying and construing the Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act, KRS 387.810 to 387.854, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 21, effective June 8, 2011.
